SEARCH
Package org.example

Interface Graph

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGraph, AdjacencyList, AdjacencyMatrix, IncidenceMatrix
public interface Graph
Interface representing a directed graph with basic operations for adding and removing vertices and edges, retrieving neighbors of a vertex, reading from a file and other operations.

  • Method Details

    • addVertex

      int addVertex()
      Adds a new vertex to the graph with the next available vertex number.
      Returns:
      the index of the newly added vertex.

    • removeVertex

      void removeVertex(int vertex)
      Removes a vertex from the graph. Does not preserve the order of the vertex numbers for IncidenceMatrix.
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex to be removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the vertex does not exist.

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(int from, int to)
      Adds a directed edge between two vertices.
      Parameters:
      from - the starting vertex.
      to - the ending vertex.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if one or both vertices do not exist.

    • removeEdge

      void removeEdge(int from, int to)
      Removes a directed edge between two vertices.
      Parameters:
      from - the starting vertex.
      to - the ending vertex.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if one or both vertices do not exist.

    • getVertexCount

      int getVertexCount()
      Returns the total number of vertices in the graph.
      Returns:
      the number of vertices.

    • hasEdge

      boolean hasEdge(int from, int to)
      Checks if an edge exists between two vertices.
      Parameters:
      from - the starting vertex.
      to - the ending vertex.
      Returns:
      true if the edge exists, false otherwise.

    • hasVertex

      boolean hasVertex(int vertex)
      Checks if a vertex exists in the graph.
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex to check.
      Returns:
      true if the vertex exists, false otherwise.

    • getNeighbors

      default Set<Integer> getNeighbors(int vertex)
      Returns the neighbors of a given vertex.
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex whose neighbors are requested.
      Returns:
      a set of neighbor vertices.

    • readFromFile

      default void readFromFile(String filename, Graph graph)
      Reads a graph from a file and populates the graph with vertices and edges.
      Parameters:
      filename - the path to the file.
      graph - an empty graph of size 0 to populate.

    • equals

      boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this graph to another object for equality based on set of neighbors.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compare to.
      Returns:
      true if the graphs are structurally equal, false otherwise.

    • hashCode

      int hashCode()
      Generates a hash code for the graph using the multiplication method.
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Object
      Returns:
      the hash code based on set of neighbors.
